Hi Bill,

> All I know is somebody is going to have to do coordination work in a
> system that has more than two actors:  client and server.  My question
> is how can these coordination requirements be improved by RESTful
> architectural principles.

Why not have the client do it? Clients get a whole bunch of useful  
(coordination) metadata in the form of the status codes in responses  
from all the resources on all the services they interact with.

Jim
